data.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food processing Enterprises Scheme (PMFME)  - Branding and Marketing  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides support for branding and marketing would be limited to 50% of the total expenditure.
data.eligibility: All food processing micro units whose proposal is related to ODOP are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Minimum turnover of product to be eligible for assistance should be Rs 500 lakh. 
  2. The proposal should relate to ODOP. 
  3. The final product should be the one to be sold to the consumer in retail pack. 
  4. Product and producers should be scalable to larger levels.
data.beneficiaries: All food processing micro units whose proposal is related to ODOP are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Minimum turnover of product to be eligible for assistance should be Rs 500 lakh. 
  2. The proposal should relate to ODOP. 
  3. The final product should be the one to be sold to the consumer in retail pack. 
  4. Product and producers should be scalable to larger levels.
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Food Processing Industries, Union Bank of India as the Nodal Bank
data.context: This scheme is introduced to Support for transition of existing 2,00,000 enterprises into formal framework.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increased access for the enterprises, to professional and technical support.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides support for branding and marketing would be limited to 50% of the total expenditure. 
  2. Support up to Rs.5 lakh would be available from State Nodal Agency (SNA) for preparing DPR for proposals for marketing & branding.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://pmfme.mofpi.gov.in/pmfme/#/Register-New-User
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. GST Certificate 
3. Financials for Last 2 years 
4. Projected financial data 
5. Lending Bank Details 
6. Basic KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Panchsheel Bhawan, 
August Kranti Marg,
Khelgaon, New Delhi-110049

Email id: support-pmfme@mofpi.gov.in  
Contact Details: 011-26406500
